a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Distribution of population between different poverty thresholds, World,
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Note: This data is expressed in 2011 international-$. Following an update, World Bank PIP now uses 2017
international-$ for its poverty and inequality data available here.
Data source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform
